name: RollSeek
description:
One of the comfortable operation is to scroll smoothly with iPhone. This is a game to be able to fully enjoy scroll.
This is a game to seek a number from 1 to 36 and touch it.
There are 3 modes.
1x1 mode: only one number is shown, other 35 numbers are hidden. You seek the number by scroll and touch it. This is the recommend mode.
2x2 mode: Four numbers are shown, other numbers are hidden.
3x3 mode: Nine numbers are shown, other numbers are hidden. 3x3 mode is the easiest.

This is a game of the art of Scroll and a moving eyesight and memory. You can enjoy it though it is a simple game.

YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w13-feLUjZw
